name: Diesel - Sideshow - Elephant Man
additionalNotes: This carnival of premium cigar goodness is one show you don’t want to miss out on. Today, CI proudly presents the Diesel Sideshow Sampler — a treasure trove of the original Diesel Unlimited blend in freak sizes sure to perk up the ears of every carnie nationwide. The Diesel you know and love, magically transformed into strange vitolas for your amusement. We’ve got ‘em all, from the culebra-style Bohemian Twins to the shaggy footed Bearded Lady. ach blend, in addition to showing off the cigar roller’s incredible skill, contains a perfectly burnable, delicious cigar with the classic bold, rich Diesel flavor.
